mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF( ID_, KEY_, VERSION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, RESOURCE_NAME_, TENANT_ID_, REV_) values (#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deploymentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1 )
mapper.select:
select * from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF d1 inner join (select KEY_, TENANT_ID_, max(VERSION_) as MAX_VERSION from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF RES where KEY_ = #{parameter}
group by TENANT_ID_, KEY_) d2 on d1.KEY_ = d2.KEY_ where d1.VERSION_ = d2.MAX_VERSION and (d1.TENANT_ID_ = d2.TENANT_ID_ or (d1.TENANT_ID_ is null and d2.TENANT_ID_ is null))

select * from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF where KEY_ = #{orqueioFormDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ is null and VERSION_ = ( select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF where KEY_ = #{orqueioFormDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ is null)

select * from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF RES where KEY_ = #{orqueioFormDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId} and VERSION_ = ( select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}ACT_RE_CAMFORMDEF where KEY_ = #{orqueioFormDefinitionKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId})
